original_text: More and more people in all parts of Syria heard about Jesus. So they brought all the sick people to see him. These people had many different illnesses, and some of them had strong pains. Bad spirits were living inside some of them. Some people could not control their bodies, and some people could not walk. Jesus caused all these people to become well again.
korean_text: 그의 소문이 온 수리아에 퍼진지라 사람들이 모든 앓는 자 곧 각종 병에 걸려서 고통 당하는 자, 귀신 들린 자, 간질하는 자, 중풍병자들을 데려오니 그들을 고치시더라

sentences.original_text: More and more people in all parts of Syria
sentences.korean_translation: 시리아의 모든 지역에서 점점 더 많은 사람들이

sentences.original_text: So they brought all the sick people
These people had many different illnesses
sentences.korean_translation: 이들은 여러 가지 다른 질병을 앓고 있었고

sentences.original_text: and some of them had strong pains
sentences.korean_translation: 그중 일부는 심한 고통을 겪고 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: Bad spirits were living inside some of them
sentences.korean_translation: 그중 일부에게는 악한 영들이 들어 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: Some people could not control their bodies
sentences.korean_translation: 어떤 사람들은 자신의 몸을 통제할 수 없었고

sentences.original_text: and some people could not walk
Jesus caused all these people to become well again
sentences.korean_translation: 예수님은 이 모든 사람들을 다시 건강하게 만드셨습니다
